abstract: The Landmarks Preservation Commission has declined to approve an apartment penthouse proposed atop the Puck Building at Lafayette and Houston Streets, but it will give the owner a chance to redesign it.
snippet: The Landmarks Preservation Commission has declined to approve an apartment penthouse proposed atop the Puck Building at Lafayette and Houston Streets, but it will give the owner a chance to redesign it.
lead_paragraph: Puck will have to try on a different top hat.

headline.main: Landmarks Panel Declines to Approve a Puck Building Penthouse
